name: Liikenneturva - Finnish Road Safety Council
goal: Influences the values, attitudes, and traffic behaviour of Finnish citizens as well as contributes to greater traffic safety awareness and respect for safety in society. Liikenneturva is a national central organisation for volunteer traffic safety work.
interests: Business and Industry, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Traffic safety policy and issues related to this such as vehicle and road network safety.
